scenarios.title: Enterprise PII Redaction
scenarios.tagline: Automatically scrubs secrets before they leave the control plane.
scenarios.summary: Upload a log bundle with exposed credentials and watch the guardrails remove every secret before the LLM or downstream systems ever see it.

primary.label: Raw Upload (Before)
primary.content:
GET https://auth.example.com/login
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...
aws_access_key_id=AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE
aws_secret_access_key=wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG/bPxRfiCYEXAMPLEKEY
ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAADAQABAAABAQC7 demo@laptop
db_password=P@ssw0rd!
customer_email=ceo@bigco.com
customer_cc=4111-1111-1111-1111

secondary.label: Redacted Output (After)
secondary.content:
GET https://auth.example.com/login
Authorization: Bearer <REDACTED_TOKEN>
aws_access_key_id=<REDACTED_ACCESS_KEY>
aws_secret_access_key=<REDACTED_SECRET_KEY>
ssh-rsa <REDACTED_PUBLIC_KEY> demo@laptop
db_password=<REDACTED_SECRET>
customer_email=<REDACTED_EMAIL>
customer_cc=<REDACTED_PAN>

talkingPoints: Secrets never touch the LLM thanks to pre-processing shields.
Operators get transparent audit trails with before vs after views.
Strict mode blocks downstream syncs if a leak is detected.

scenarios.title: Cross-Workspace Semantic Search
scenarios.tagline: Find similar incidents instantly with vector search across tenants.
scenarios.summary: Demonstrate how the similarity index surfaces the most relevant historical incidents, even when they originated in another customer workspace.

items.title: Incident 8421 - API handshake timeout
items.summary: Resolved Appian deployment stalled on OAuth microservice handshake.

items.title: Incident 8267 - Secrets rotation drift
items.summary: Automation Anywhere bots failed after mid-span credential rotation.

items.title: Incident 7994 - Blue Prism token expiry
items.summary: Stale API token blocked downstream queue processing for 27 minutes.

secondary.label: Active Filters
secondary.content:
Query: "oauth handshake retry budget exhausted"
Platform filter: All
Confidence threshold: 0.75
Workspaces: Global federation

talkingPoints: Similarity spans every workspace the analyst can access.
Filters let you dial the signal-to-noise ratio live.
Each result links directly into the RCA narrative for fast knowledge transfer.

scenarios.title: Outcome Classification & Exec Brief
scenarios.tagline: LLM-driven narratives with structured severity and actions.
scenarios.summary: Show how the RCA Engine turns raw evidence into a board-ready summary with clear classifications and next steps.

primary.label: Executive Summary
primary.content:
Severity: High
Impact: Customer onboarding stalled in three regions.
Primary cause: OAuth token rotation skipped in staging pipeline.
Mitigation: Rotated secrets, restarted worker pods, validated downstream SLAs.

secondary.label: Structured Output
secondary.content:
{
  "summary": "OAuth handshake failures halted onboarding for 1,240 customers.",
  "severity": "high",
  "actions": [
    "Rotate ServiceNow OAuth credentials",
    "Purge stale runtime secrets",
    "Trigger regression run for login microservice"
  ],
  "confidence": 0.91,
  "owner": "Customer Identity Guild"
}

talkingPoints: Stakeholders receive structured outputs and human-friendly prose in one shot.
Confidence scores and actions give operators a launchpad for mitigation.
Outputs stay exportable as Markdown, HTML, or JSON.
